results.description: Use rsk70_mfm2_usfast_1drevrsl to capture daily mean-reversion. Applied SUGGESTION1 partially (single strong field) because this factor is highly used (high user/alphaCount). SUGGESTION2: no vector fields found so not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage=1 so ts_backfill not needed. SUGGESTION4: used high userCount field (applied). Kept implementation short and <=2 datafields. Confidence 0.78.

Long momentum and short large size using rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_size. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). No vector fields for SUGGESTION2. Both coverages ~1 so SUGGESTION3 not applied. Both fields have decent userCounts (applied SUGGESTION4). Implementation respects operator/data limits. Confidence 0.72.

Fade extreme hedge fund ownership using hedge_fund_ownership_percent. SUGGESTION1: single but strong field (high userCount) chosen. SUGGESTION2: none. Coverage=1 so no ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.75.

Exploit persistence in daily_specific_return via ts_zscore to capture recent idiosyncratic momentum. SUGGESTION1: single time-series field used. SUGGESTION2: none. Coverage=1 so no backfill. High userCount used (applied SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.73.

Prefer low residual volatility rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol (mean-revert low vol stocks). SUGGESTION1: single field due to strength. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Coverage=1 no backfill. UserCount moderate (applied SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Hedge fund ownership percent vs sentiment
results.description: Long stocks with positive sentiment and low hedge fund ownership: subtract(hedge_fund_ownership_percent from sentiment). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Vector suggestion not applicable. Coverage fine. SUGGESTION4: used high userCount sentiment and hedge fund fields. Confidence 0.76.

Capture value premium while hedging momentum: subtract(momentum from value). SUGGESTION1 applied. No vector fields. Coverage ~1 mostly, so no ts_backfill. Used high userCount style factors (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.70.

Favor momentum in smaller-cap stocks: multiply momentum by inverse size. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Coverage good; used high userCount fields. Implementation respects operator/data limits. Confidence 0.71.

Exploit short interest extremes using rsk70_mfm2_usfast_shortint: mean-revert very high short interest. SUGGESTION1 single field but high quality. SUGGESTION2 not applied. Coverage=1. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Residual volatility scaled by market cap
results.description: Prefer low residual volatility especially among small caps: divide reverse(resvol) by current_market_cap_usd (normalize effect). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). No vectors. Coverage good. Used high userCount fields when possible (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.69.

Long high earnings quality trend: ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty). SUGGESTION1 single field due to factor strength. SUGGESTION2 not applied. Coverage 0.9512 (>0.6) so no ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 used (reasonable userCount). Confidence 0.67.
Use prospect_specret_daily to capture short-term earnings surprise momentum. SUGGESTION1 single field. Coverage=1 so no backfill. High userCount (applied SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.74.

Favor profitable firms with low yield crowding: subtract(dividend yield loading from profit). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Coverage high. Used high userCount fields when available. Confidence 0.65.

Exploit negative sentiment with elevated short interest: multiply shortint by reverse(sentiment). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. No vectors. Coverage good; used large userCount sentiment. Confidence 0.68.
Prefer low specific_risk_value_2 stocks (less idiosyncratic uncertainty). SUGGESTION1 single field. SUGGESTION4: field has decent userCount. Coverage=1. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Daily specific return momentum scaled by size
results.description: Capture idiosyncratic momentum but reduce cap-weight bias: divide ts_zscore(daily_specific_return,10) by zscore(current_market_cap_usd). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Coverage fine. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Hedge-fund crowding and specific risk fade
results.description: Sell high hedge fund ownership and high specific risk: subtract(zscore(specific_risk_value_2) + zscore(hedge_fund_ownership_percent)). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). No vectors. Coverage good. Confidence 0.74.
Amplify momentum for firms with positive prospect surprises: multiply zscore(momentum) by ts_zscore(prospect_specret_daily,10). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. High userCounts used. Confidence 0.75.

results.idea: Value recovery signal: long high value, short high resvol
results.description: Expect undervalued with stable volatility to outperform: subtract(zscore(resvol) from zscore(value)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion of daily specific returns cross-sectionally
results.description: Cross-sectional zscore of recent daily_specific_return to trade mean-reversion across names. SUGGESTION1: single field time-series converted cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION2 not applied. Coverage=1. High userCount used. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Industry exposure arbitrage: semiconductors vs equipment
results.description: Go long semiconductor exposure and short semiconductor_equipment_exposure_score to capture differential industry leadership. SUGGESTION1 used 2 related fields. SUGGESTION4: used fields with decent userCounts. Coverage=1. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Net retail momentum vs short interest
results.description: Long net_retail_exposure_score with positive momentum and low short interest: subtract shortint from net_retail momentum proxy. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Coverage good. Confidence 0.64.

Fade hedge fund crowding but reduce small cap bias: divide reverse(hedge_fund_ownership_percent) by zscore(current_market_cap_usd). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Coverage fine. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Short-term reversal scaled by specific risk
results.description: Mean-revert 1-day reversal stronger where specific risk is low: multiply reverse(ts_zscore(1drevrsl,5)) by inverse(zscore(specific_risk_value_2)). SUGGESTION1 applied. No vectors. Coverage good. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Momentum decay filter using profit factor
results.description: Favor momentum only when profitability (profit) is high: multiply zscore(momentum) by zscore(profit). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.69.

Trade stocks with strong recent prospect_specret_monthly but poor sentiment: subtract sentiment from prospect monthly. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. Confidence 0.72.
Normalize momentum by size to favor small-cap momentum: divide zscore(momentum) by ts_zscore(size,20). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Coverage good. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Price momentum regulated by residual volatility
results.description: Favor momentum where residual volatility is low: multiply zscore(momentum) by inverse(zscore(resvol)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Short interest and daily specific return divergence

results.idea: Short-term reversal scaled by hedge fund count

results.description: Favor momentum when down-risk loading (dwnrisk) is low: multiply zscore(momentum) by inverse(zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_dwnrisk)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. Confidence 0.66.
Prefer value stocks with high management quality: multiply zscore(value) by zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_mgmtqlty). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage mgmtqlty ~0.8817 (>0.6) no backfill. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Specific risk variance limiter for reversals
results.description: Only apply 1d reversal when specific_risk_variance below median: trade_when(reverse(ts_zscore(1drevrsl,5)), less(specific_risk_variance, ts_zscore(specific_risk_variance,20))). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Kept operators within limit. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by short interest quantile
results.description: Apply momentum only in names with short interest quantile below threshold: trade_when(zscore(momentum), less(quantile(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_shortint), 0.7), 0). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.66.
